original_text: Lord, bow down thine ear, and hear: open, Lord, thine eyes, and see: and hear the words of Sennacherib, which hath sent him to reproach the living God.
korean_text: 여호와여 귀를 기울여 들으소서 여호와여 눈을 떠서 보시옵소서 산헤립이 살아 계신 하나님을 비방하러 보낸 말을 들으시옵소서

sentences.original_text: Lord, bow down thine ear, and hear
open, Lord, thine eyes, and see
and hear the words of Sennacherib
which hath sent him to reproach the living God
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 사신 산헤립이 살아 계신 하나님을 비난하려 함이니이다
